title: Plat 3 adc/sp LF duo partner
body:
Had enough 75 points for ward skin so trying to climb to Diamond
Main Botlane (my duo partner should be the same so it is easier for communication, but other roles are fine, just pref)
Play every night after 7 til late
Have Skype ts etc
I am friendly but very serious while playing. Happy to make new friends ( can be irl or in-game lol)
Add me in-game for chat.
P/s To me I don't really need something like "oh let's duo normal to test your skills". straight to rank! If you think I'm bad, feel free to find other partners!

replies.body: Interested in becoming a duo partner. I play friday/saturday. Add me in game. Platinum 3 at the moment.
zomgitslogan ign plat 2 I can do anything
